subject: Message From UNiCAJA Bank
body:
Hello Aracely 

Your email is duly acknowledged by us , 

Firstly the amount in us dollars is $1870 . 

I will recommend you pay via bitcoin it faster and enable us to speed up the process. 

After this email  I will be sending you the bitcoin wallet info . 
Note after payment you will send us an email notifying us .. 

Sanchez Pedro

subject: Bitcoin wallet below
body: bc1qn5w47e70zmlu4zuvq0cer00gkgy3ueapwhh4kw

subject: Re: Message From UNiCAJA Bank
body:
Hello Sanchez Pedro,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information you've provided. I'm not very familiar with bitcoin, could you please explain a bit more about how it works? Also, could you provide more details about the process after payment?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Aracely

subject: Re: Message From UNiCAJA/CAIXA Bank
body:
Dear customer 
We are in receipt of your detail , However, you are to send down the required amount needed to open your  account with us. 
As soon as you send this amount and the account has been activated, your ACCOUNT NUMBER and your PIN NUMBER will be given to you. Only then will you be able to visit our secured e-fund web link. You would be prompted to enter (Account Access Code) i.e your account number and pin number before connection can be made to your account and then your account be credited with fund . 
For now, your account has not been created until you send down the required initial account opening balance minimum deposit needed to 
activate or create it which is refundable. 
Then Login Instruction into online account will be send to you, 
As you are not aware of this BITCOIN ACCOUNT  payment we have resolved the issue you make the payment via Bank wire transfer to the account officer assign to you. 
You’re requested to make the payment of 1850 USD =  1713 Euro via wire transfer to account information below. 
ACCOUNT NAME : AGBAI O. AGU 
BANK NAME : CAIXABANK 
BANK ADDRESS: NUEVA YORK  24 , 28938 MOSTOLES MADRID SPAIN 
IBAN NO : ES46 2100 5440 9213 0019 6324 
ACCOUNT NO : 2100 5440 9213 0019 6324 
SWIFT : CAIXESBBXXX 
After payment send us the scan copy of the payment receipts 
Regard 
Mr Pedro Sanchez.

subject: Guidelines on how to pay activation fee
body:
Dear customer 
We are in receipt of your detail , However, you are to send down the required amount needed to open your  account with us. 
As soon as you send this amount and the account has been activated, your ACCOUNT NUMBER and your PIN NUMBER will be given to you. Only then will you be able to visit our secured e-fund web link. You would be prompted to enter (Account Access Code) i.e your account number and pin number before connection can be made to your account and then your account be credited with fund . 
For now, your account has not been created until you send down the required initial account opening balance minimum deposit needed to 
activate or create it which is refundable. 
Then Login Instruction into online account will be send to you, 
As you are not aware of this BITCOIN ACCOUNT  payment we have resolved the issue you make the payment via Bank wire transfer to the account officer assign to you. 
You’re requested to make the payment of 1850 USD =  1713 Euro via wire transfer to account information below. 
ACCOUNT NAME : AGBAI O. AGU 
BANK NAME : CAIXABANK 
BANK ADDRESS: NUEVA YORK  24 , 28938 MOSTOLES MADRID SPAIN 
IBAN NO : ES 46 2100 5440 9213 0019 6324 
ACCOUNT NO : 2100 5440 9213 0019 6324 
SWIFT : CAIXESBBXXX 
After payment send us the scan copy of the payment receipts 
Regard 
Mr Pedro Sanchez. 

-------- End of forwarded message --------

subject: Re: Guidelines on how to pay activation fee
body:
Hello Mr. Pedro Sanchez,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information provided. I'm quite new to this whole process, so I hope you don't mind me asking a few questions.

Firstly, could you please explain more about the initial account opening balance? Is this a standard procedure for all accounts or is it specific to my case?

Secondly, regarding the payment via Bank wire transfer, could you provide more details on how this works? I've never done a wire transfer before and would appreciate some guidance.

Lastly, once my account is activated and I receive my Account Access Code, what are the next steps? How will I be able to access my funds?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Aracely

subject: Re: Guidelines on how to pay activation fee
body:
+ accountdept@ 

Hello Aracely 

Your email is duly acknowledged by me , in swift response to your email in regard to you first question as it's standard banking process  for customer awaiting credit from the escrow accounts of an amount above a million United state dollars must ve a minimum deposit of 1870 US Dollars in their non residential account . 

You can go to your bank and make international transfer to the assigned  account information in our previous email. 

Your account will be credit with sixty millions us dollars including the activation to pay by you . 

Please we will need your following information 
Direct Cell Phone Number 
WhatsApp Number. 

Regard 
Sanchez Pedro

subject: Re: After payment procedure
body:
Hello Mr. Pedro Sanchez,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information provided. I'm quite new to this whole process, so I hope you don't mind me asking a few questions.

Firstly, could you please explain more about this initial account opening balance? Is it a standard procedure for all customers or is it specific to my case?

Secondly, regarding the payment method, I'm not very familiar with wire transfers. Could you possibly guide me through the process? 

Lastly, once my account is activated and I receive my account number and PIN number, how secure will my account be? 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Aracely

subject: Re: Message From UNiCAJA Bank
body:
Hello Sanchez Pedro,

It's great to hear from you! Sending money outside the country can be done through various methods. You could use an international wire transfer through your bank, or use online services like PayPal, Western Union, or MoneyGram. 

However, I'm sorry but I can't provide my cell phone number. Is there anything else you'd like to know about sending money internationally?

Best wishes,
Aracely

subject: Re: Guidelines on how to pay activation fee
body:
Hello Sanchez Pedro,

Thank you for your swift response. I appreciate the detailed explanation about the banking process. It's quite interesting to learn about these things.

Just to clarify, you mentioned that I need to make a deposit in my non-residential account, correct? Could you please explain a bit more about this process? 

Also, regarding the information you asked for, I'm sorry but I can't provide my personal details over email due to security reasons. Is there any other way we could proceed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Aracely
